author: jens
msg: cmis test tool: couple of minor bug fixes in property mapper

author: cws
msg: HIVE-3450. Hive maven-publish ant task should be configurable (Travis Crawford via cws)

author: chenpei
msg: Once we move the common items out of iCTAKES (testdata, cvd/cpe launcher), I don't think it makes sense to have duplicate src trees with identical *.java files for each of the components.  We should be able to build the binaries for distribution via maven or scripts.

author: jwross
msg: ARIES-925: Fixed issue in org.apache.aries.subsystem.itests.util.BundleInfoImpl where JarFile objects were being created but not closed. This class is used during the generation of the repository.xml which consists of a large number of bundle files. I then realized the repository.xml generation itself is no longer needed for the itests. So I removed it altogether.
Also fixed a potential issue in org.apache.aries.subsystem.core.internal.BundleResourceInstaller where an input stream might be left open.
org.apache.aries.subsystem.core.internal.BundleResource was refactored as part of this work to make the code cleaner and easier to read.
